item.content:encoded:
Overview

The Roadside Vehicle Recovery Assistance System is a specialized service that supports drivers, particularly luxury vehicle owners, during breakdowns or accidents. It ensures safety, minimizes disruptions, and provides swift recovery through trained professionals and advanced tools.

Key features include:

  • AI Assistance

  • Find Mechanics

  • Spare Parts Shop

  • Tow Truck Services

Using Technologies:
  • Frontend – HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap
  • Backend – PHP, MYSQL
Website Screenshots:
  • Link – RVRA System
